subject: Rosemary Ellen Guiley to talk about Ghost Boxes tonight
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
I just got this post over on MySpace from Rosemary Ellen Guiley.
Here is what she wrote:
I will be on C2C tonight, in the studio with George Noory in LA, 
talking about Frank's Box and other boxes based on the FB. I have 
several myself -- two FB, one Mini-Box, one Craig's Box and one Radio 
Shack hack. Tune in the first hour, 10 PM PST.
